text:
e="preserve">Roberto Junguito Bonnet (1943 – 27 December 2020) was a Colombian politician. He was Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development from 1983 to 1984 and Minister of Finance and Public Credit from 1984 to 1985 and again from 2002 to 2003. He was born in Bogotá.
Junguito was the Ambassador to the European Union from 1983 to 1984 and of France from 1986 to 1987.
Junguito died on 27 December 2020 in Bogotá, aged 77.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development
Minister of Finance and Public Credit
